ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the dose per adminis
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the dose per administration (of study treatment)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the dose or amount of study treatment that was administered to/taken by the subject in the period recorded; from the start date/time to the end date/time inclusive.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Dose or amount taken for single administration of study treatment or per constant dosing interval recorded. Dose must be collected if it cannot be determined via other methods (e.g., from diary data, drug accountability data, protocol etc.). The data collected in this dose text-format field should be mapped to either SDTMIG variable EXDOSE if numeric or EXDOSTXT if text.

ReferenceDocuments.name: EXDOSTXT or EXDOSE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. Numeric values map to EXDOSE in SDTM. Non-numeric values (e.g., 200-400) map to EXDOSTXT in SDTM.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2182728 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.

DataElement.changeDescription: Created as part of CDISC mapping task. 6.21.18 mc
